title: In June Jobs Report, Positive Numbers Belie Frustrations Beneath Surface
teaser: Employers added 223,000 jobs in June, and the unemployment rate fell to 5.3 percent. But wage growth was flat, and the drop in the unemployment rate had a lot to do with people leaving the workforce.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
